pk.name: piotrkaluza.pl
pk.text: My photography portfolio - a custom theme created for Wordpress. It has blog, photo grid with popups, forms & private galleries that can be shared to clients. (v2 in progress. Same functionality + shop - ReactJS)

portfolio.name: dev-portfolio
portfolio.text: My first project built with ReactJS. It's a simple one-page website with particles, portfolio projects & contact form.

llf.name: LivLifeFoods
llf.text: Wordpress theme for LivLifeFoods - A simple website built with the emphasis on visual appearance.

shs.name: Stonehenge School
shs.text: Website built for school. It has blog, news, events, forms and search functionality

icc.name: International Cat Care
icc.text: It's 1 out of 3 websites about cats. It has news area, donations, popups and search

sudio.name: Sudio
sudio.text: Multi store e-commerce website with earbuds, built on Magento 2.
sudio.technologies: PHP, HTML, SCSS, JS, XML, KnockoutJS, RequireJS, jQuery

gastonluga.name: GastonLuga
gastonluga.text: Multi store e-commerce website with backpacks, built on Magento 2. It has product swatches, bundles, catalog with filters and reviews
gastonluga.technologies: PHP, HTML, SCSS, JS, XML, KnockoutJS, RequireJS, jQuery

marcmirren.name: Marc Mirren
marcmirren.text: Multi e-commerce website with jawellery, built on Magento 2
